Installation Guide
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
Installation
------------
Dependencies
>>>>>>>>>>>>
mlstacking requires:

- Python (>= 3.5)
- NumPy (>= 1.11.0)
- SciPy (>= 0.17.0)
- joblib (>= 0.11)

User installation
>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
If you already have a working installation of numpy and scipy,
the easiest way to install mlstacking is using pip.
::

    pip install mlstacking
